features: 🏠Design for Swiffer Power Mop- Measuring 15" x 4.7", these power mop pads are 100% compatible with Swiffer PowerMop Multi-Surface Mop, Swiffer PowerMop Wood Mop & other 13"-15" Mop. Comes with 6 washable mop pads for replacement and use by area, you can always have one new alternative. Buy with confidence: 365-day warranty and consulting service.

🏠Wet Dry Use- These swiffer power mop refill pads are made of highly absorbent chenile that won't leave puddles or streaks in wet use to protect your floors and furniture from oversoaking. Meanwhile, they can easily lock and absorb dust, dirt, debris and pet hair in dry use.

🏠Saving Your Money- Papclean swiffer power mop refills are machine washable and can be used for hundreds of times. Compared to those disposable cloths, our reusable powermop pads are more cost effective and earth friendly. They are odorless and non-fading as good partner for cleaning floors, giving you a shiny and safe home.

🏠Easy to Use- These powermop pads can easily attach to the mop by sticking to the reverse side of mop head and simply peel off when replacing. They can restore clean by placing in washing machine, saving your time and energy. Each pad is equipped with a small hook for easy storage and hanging to dry. Please note that our mop pads are only suitable for attachable mops. Please do not use bleach or fabric softener.

🏠Wide Application- Papclean power mop refills can be used on all types of finished floors, including laminate, hardwood, tile, marble and vinyl and other hard surfaces such as windows, walls and ceilings. Perfect for use in home, dorm rooms, apartments and offices. Note: Mop Not Included.

Hook Design for Easy Storage Each powermop pad has a hook on the back for easy hanging dry. The small hook can also assist you in tearing off dirty mop pads.

Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I still have to scrub with the mop
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes you have to scrub at stubborn spills on the floor. I'd hoped I wouldn't have to do that as much with these mop pads, but unfortunately I still have to scrub. I like that these are washable and reusable though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient, Cost Effective, Reusable mop pads!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These reusable mop pads from Papclean are a must buy if you love to save💲money, prefer purchasing eco-friendly options and love an efficient product that delivers good looking results!Firstly, make sure you measure your mop head before purchasing this product. These will only fit the Swiffer Powermop and other compatible mops that measure 13-15 inches in length.I love how easy they are to attach to my Casabella ‘infuse’ mop. The firm Velcro grip guarantees no slipping or movement whilst in use. They are very plush and made of high-density microfiber, that quickly absorbs, locks in dirt and debris with ease, resulting in a clean looking surface with no streaks! The pads are effective at cleaning wet or dry messes, on a variety of different surfaces.What I love most about them (other than coming in my favorite color 💜) is they can simply be hand washed or placed in the washing machine, after use. Make sure you don’t use fabric softener or bleach while laundering, so that these pads continue to perform at their highest level. Air drying the pads are my recommendation as well. They have a convenient built-in hanging loop for an easy storage option, or while air drying.Ok, let’s go over the positive features of this product -•Great value 6 pack•Awesome colors to choose from•Cleans wet or dry messes with ease•Eco-friendly/Sustainable option•Money💲Saving•Built-in hanging loop for storage/drying•Cleans a variety of surfacesThe only negative feedback I have about this product is that it won’t fit every kind of mop brand on the market. It will also require extra time for laundering duties. Not a big deal for me! The positive points easily outweigh the negative in my opinion, with this product.I recommend these wholeheartedly 💜. You really don’t have that much to lose; just a whole lot of dirt, dust, grime and pet hair.Definitely a 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ product in my opinion!Happy cleaning!! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washable and Reusable!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased Papclean power mop refills for my Swiffer Power Mop and found them to be an excellent addition to my cleaning arsenal. These pads, compatible with various Swiffer models, come in a pack of six, making it easy to rotate through them for consistent cleanliness. Despite being tightly vacuum-packed, which suggested pre-soaking, I skipped this step and was pleased to see they expanded and worked well regardless.The dual functionality for wet and dry use is a standout feature. The absorbent chenille material ensures a streak-free clean in wet use and effectively picks up dust and pet hair in dry use. Their environmental and economic benefits are notable as well; these machine-washable pads are a sustainable alternative to disposable cloths, and their durability through multiple washes without losing effectiveness or color is impressive.Ease of use and versatility further add to their appeal. The pads attach and detach from the mop head effortlessly, and the inclusion of a small hook on each pad is a thoughtful touch for easy storage and drying. Suitable for a variety of floor types and other hard surfaces, these mop refills have proven to be a practical choice for not just homes, but also dorms and offices. Overall, the Papclean power mop refills offer a blend of efficiency, convenience, and sustainability, making them a valuable tool for routine cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Better than the Original
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the performance of these reusable pads. They are durable and will last many uses each before having to get more. The velcro backing stays in place on the mop and evenly absorbs and spreads cleaner/water. Would high recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good washable and reusable mop pads for our mop head.
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended for swiffer style mop heads compatible with them. Very durable and absorbent mop pads. They easy hand wash and hang dry for multiple uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Save a few trees and dollars. Give these a try.
reviews.reviewText: I picked up the Papclean reusable mop pads because I was tired of tossing expensive disposable mop pads after every cleaning. They fit my Swiffer Powermop just fine and grip well, no slipping or flopping around. They leave my floors pretty clean, maybe not as clean as the disposable originals but, picking up dust and pet hair is not a problem. Being machine washable makes them super convenient. Just toss them in the washing machine and they're good to go again. Sure, they take a little longer to dry, but the eco-friendliness and reusability make it worth the wait. I could see them not sticking to the mop after many uses, but by that time you would have saved a tree or two and quit a few dollars. We will definitely get more of these pads.
